delete.bannerDescription: {count, plural, one {This organization will be permanently deleted in # day. Contact your administrator if you believe this is a mistake.} other {This organization will be permanently deleted in # days. Contact your administrator if you believe this is a mistake.}}
delete.confirmDescription: This will schedule the organization for deletion. You will have 5 days to recover it before all data is permanently deleted.

data.timeEntries: All time entries and work periods

delete.description: Permanently delete this organization and all its data
delete.pendingDescription: This organization is scheduled for permanent deletion
delete.recoveryNote: All organization data will be permanently deleted after this date. Click the button below to cancel deletion and recover the organization.
delete.scheduledSuccess: Organization scheduled for deletion. You have 5 days to recover it.

delete.warning: This will schedule the organization for deletion. You will have 5 days to recover it before all data is permanently deleted.

features.description: Enable or disable optional features for your organization
features.owner-only: Only organization owners can change feature settings.
features.projects-description: Assign time entries to projects, track budgets and deadlines, and generate project reports.
features.surcharges-description: Configure time surcharges for overtime, night work, weekends, and holidays.
features.title: Features
features.work-shifts-description: Enable work shifts with drag-and-drop planning, open shifts, and swap requests.

organization.noEmployeeRecord: You are not set up as an employee in this organization yet.

recover.confirmDescription: This will cancel the scheduled deletion and restore the organization. All data will be preserved.

organization.slugDescription: Used in URLs. Auto-generated from name.
organization.slugTaken: This slug is already taken. Please choose a different one.

timezone.description: Set the default timezone for your organization. This is used for absence tracking, reports, and other date-based features. Individual users can override this in their profile settings.
timezone.owner-only: Only organization owners can change the timezone setting.
timezone.title: Timezone

apiKeys.createDescription: Create a new API key for programmatic access. The key will only be shown once.
apiKeys.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the API key "{name}"? Any applications using this key will immediately lose access. This action cannot be undone.
apiKeys.description: Create and manage API keys for programmatic access to your organization data.
apiKeys.editDescription: Update the settings for this API key. Note: You cannot view or change the key itself.

empty.description: Create your first API key to enable programmatic access to your organization.
empty.title: No API Keys

form.enabledHelp: Disabled keys will reject all API requests
form.name: Name
form.nameHelp: A descriptive name to identify this key

apiKeys.name: Name

noOrg.description: You need to be part of an organization to manage API keys.
noOrg.title: No Organization

security.description: API keys provide full access to your organization data within their permission scope. Keep them secure and never share them in public repositories or client-side code.
security.title: Security Notice

apiKeys.showConfirmWarning: Are you sure? You haven't copied the key yet.
apiKeys.showDescription: Your new API key "{name}" has been created. Copy it now - you won't be able to see it again!
apiKeys.showWarning: This is the only time you will see this key. Make sure to copy and store it securely.
apiKeys.title: API Keys

config.autoEnableDataHint: Automatically create audit packages for all data exports
config.autoEnablePayrollHint: Automatically create audit packages for all payroll exports
config.description: Configure retention periods and automatic audit hardening
config.featureHashes: SHA-256 per-file hashes with Merkle tree integrity
config.featureWorm: Optional S3 Object Lock (WORM) for immutability
config.initSuccess: Audit export initialized. Signing key generated.
config.modeComplianceHint: Compliance: Locks cannot be removed by anyone
config.modeGovernanceHint: Governance: Admins can override locks if needed
config.notConfiguredDescription: Audit export provides GoBD-compliant cryptographic hardening for your data and payroll exports with digital signatures, timestamps, and optional WORM retention.
config.objectLockNotSupportedHint: Your S3 bucket does not have Object Lock enabled. Cryptographic proofs will still be generated, but WORM protection will not be enforced at the storage level.
config.retentionYearsHint: GoBD requires 10 years for tax-relevant documents
config.title: Audit Export Configuration

auditExport.description: GoBD-compliant export hardening with digital signatures and WORM retention

keys.description: Manage Ed25519 signing keys for audit package authentication
keys.exportDescription: Use this public key to verify audit package signatures externally
keys.historyDescription: All signing keys used by this organization
keys.rotateDescription: This will generate a new signing key. The old key will be kept for verification of existing packages but will no longer be used for new signatures. This action cannot be undone.
keys.rotateHint: Key rotation is recommended annually or if you suspect key compromise. Old keys remain valid for verifying previously signed packages.
keys.title: Signing Key Management

packages.emptyHint: Audit packages are created when you enable automatic hardening or manually harden an export.
packages.title: Audit Packages

auditExport.title: Audit Export

auditLog.description: View and search all actions performed in your organization

calendar.noProvidersConfigured: No calendar providers are configured. Contact your system administrator to set up OAuth credentials.

syncBehavior.autoSyncDesc: Automatically sync absences to connected calendars when approved

changePolicies.approvalDaysDescription: Beyond self-service, employees can request changes within this window (requires approval). 0 = no additional window.
changePolicies.assignEmployeeDescription: This policy will apply only to this specific employee, overriding any team or organization policies.
changePolicies.assignOrgDescription: This policy will apply to all employees who don't have a team or individual policy assigned.
changePolicies.assignTeamDescription: This policy will apply to all team members who don't have an individual policy assigned.
changePolicies.beyondWindow: Beyond {days} days: only admins/team leads can edit
changePolicies.createPolicyFirst: Create a policy first before assigning it.
changePolicies.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this policy? Any assignments using this policy will also be removed. Employees previously using this policy will have no restrictions until a new policy is assigned.
changePolicies.description: Control when employees can edit their time tracking entries and when manager approval is required
changePolicies.dialogDescription: Configure when employees can edit their time entries and when approval is required.
changePolicies.employeeOverridesDescription: Override team or organization defaults for specific employees (e.g., special arrangements).
changePolicies.inheritanceInfo: Policies are applied in priority order: Employee overrides take precedence over Team overrides, which take precedence over the Organization Default. If no policy is assigned at any level, employees can edit their time entries without restrictions.
changePolicies.name: Name
changePolicies.noEmployeeOverrides: No employee-specific policies. Employees use their team or organization default.
changePolicies.noOrgDefaultDescription: Without an organization default, employees can edit their time entries without restrictions.
changePolicies.noPoliciesHint: Without a change policy, employees can edit their time entries without restrictions. Create a policy to enforce approval workflows.
changePolicies.noTeamOverrides: No team-specific policies. All teams use the organization default.
changePolicies.notifyAllDescription: When off, only the primary manager receives approval requests
changePolicies.organizationDefaultDescription: The default policy applied to all employees who don't have a team or individual override.
changePolicies.removeEmployeeDescription: This will remove the override for "{name}". They will use their team or organization default.
changePolicies.removeOrgDescription: This will remove the organization default policy. Employees will have no restrictions unless they have a team or individual override.
changePolicies.removeTeamDescription: This will remove the policy from team "{team}". They will use the organization default.
changePolicies.selfServiceDaysDescription: Employees can freely edit entries within this window. 0 = same day only.
changePolicies.teamOverridesDescription: Override the organization default for specific teams (e.g., different departments or work schedules).
changePolicies.title: Change Policies
changePolicies.trustModeDescription: Allow employees to edit entries without any approval requirements
changePolicies.zeroDayPolicy: Every clock-out will require manager approval (strictest mode).

surcharges.deleteOrgAssignmentDescription: This will remove the organization default. Teams and employees without specific assignments will have no surcharge model applied.
surcharges.deleteTeamAssignmentDescription: This will remove the surcharge model from team "{team}". They will use the organization default.
surcharges.description: Configure time surcharges for overtime, night work, weekends, and holidays.
surcharges.descriptionPlaceholder: Optional description of this surcharge model
surcharges.employeeDialogDescription: Select a surcharge model and employee to override team or organization defaults
surcharges.employeeLevelDescription: Override team or organization defaults for specific employees
surcharges.modelDescription: Define surcharge rules for overtime, night work, weekends, and holidays.
surcharges.noModelsDescription: Create a surcharge model to define rules for overtime, night work, and weekend premiums.
surcharges.noRulesDescription: Add rules to define when surcharges apply
surcharges.orgDialogDescription: Select a surcharge model to be the default for all employees in the organization
surcharges.orgLevelDescription: Default surcharge model applied to all employees unless overridden
surcharges.reportsDescription: View surcharge calculations and summaries for your employees.
surcharges.teamDialogDescription: Select a surcharge model and team to override the organization default
surcharges.teamLevelDescription: Override organization defaults for specific teams
surcharges.title: Surcharges

telegram.botTokenHelp: Create a bot with @BotFather on Telegram and paste the token here.

disconnectConfirm.description: This will disable all Telegram notifications and commands for your organization. Employee account links will be preserved.
disconnectConfirm.title: Disconnect Telegram Bot?

features.approvalsDesc: Send approval requests and allow approve/reject via Telegram
features.description: Configure which features are enabled for the Telegram bot.
features.digestDesc: Send a daily summary of absences and schedules
features.escalationsDesc: Escalate unanswered approvals to the next manager

linking.description: Link your Telegram account to receive personal notifications.

linking.title: Telegram Account

telegram.notConfigured: Telegram is not configured for this organization. Contact your administrator.

unlinkConfirm.description: You will stop receiving Telegram notifications. You can link again later.

timeRegulations.atLeastOneOption: At least one break option is required
timeRegulations.noBreakRulesDescription: Add break rules to define required breaks based on working time
timeRegulations.optionsDescription: Define how employees can split their break time
timeRegulations.thresholdDescription: Trigger when working more than this

assignments.companyDefaultDescription: The default policy applied to all employees. Manage defaults in the Policies tab.
assignments.deleteEmployeeDescription: This will remove the override for "{name}". They will use their team or company default.
assignments.deleteTeamDescription: This will remove the policy from team "{team}". They will use the company default.
assignments.employeeLevelDescription: Override team or company defaults for specific employees (e.g., special contracts)
assignments.employeeNote: This policy will override team and company defaults for this employee
assignments.employeePolicyDescription: Select a vacation policy and employee. This overrides team and company defaults.
assignments.inheritanceInfo: Policies are applied in priority order: Employee overrides take precedence over Team overrides, which take precedence over the Company Default. Create overrides only when needed.
assignments.noEmployeePolicies: No employee-specific policies. Employees use their team or company default.
assignments.noPolicies: No vacation policies available. Create one first.
assignments.noTeamPolicies: No team-specific policies. All teams use the company default.
assignments.teamLevelDescription: Override the company default for specific teams (e.g., different locations or schedules)
assignments.teamNote: This policy will apply to all employees in this team
assignments.teamPolicyDescription: Select a vacation policy and team. This overrides the company default for team members.

vacation.description: Manage vacation policies and assignments for your organization

employees.description: Configure custom vacation allowances for individual employees
employees.title: Employee Allowances

vacation.fallsBackToTeamOrDefault: Falls back to team or company default
vacation.noDefaultPolicyDescription: Create a policy and mark it as Company Default in the Policies tab.
vacation.policyDescription: Configure vacation allowance settings. Each policy can be assigned to the organization, specific teams, or individual employees.
vacation.title: Vacation

wellness.description: Configure water reminders and hydration tracking during your work sessions
wellness.title: Wellness Settings

workCategories.assignEmployeeDescription: Override the team or organization default for a specific employee
workCategories.assignOrgDescription: This category set will be the default for all employees
workCategories.assignTeamDescription: Override the organization default for a specific team
workCategories.categoriesDescription: Create and manage work categories that can be shared across multiple sets
workCategories.categoryInUse: Cannot delete a category that is used in {count} set(s). Remove it from all sets first.
workCategories.createCategoriesFirst: Create categories in the Categories tab first
workCategories.createCategoryDescription: Create a new work category that can be assigned to multiple sets
workCategories.createSetDescription: Create a new category set and select which categories to include
workCategories.deleteEmployeeAssignment: This will remove the override for "{name}". They will use their team or organization default.
workCategories.deleteOrgAssignment: This will remove the organization default. Employees will not have work categories available unless assigned individually.
workCategories.deleteSetDescription: This will permanently delete the category set "{name}" and all its categories. Any assignments using this set will also be removed.
workCategories.deleteTeamAssignment: This will remove the category set from team "{team}". They will use the organization default.
workCategories.description: Define work categories with time factors for effective time calculation
workCategories.editSetDescription: Update the category set details and manage its categories
workCategories.employeeLevelDescription: Override team or organization defaults for specific employees
workCategories.factorExplanation: Factor determines effective time: 0.5 = 50% (e.g., passive travel), 1.0 = 100% (normal work), 1.5 = 150% (overtime)
workCategories.noCategoriesHint: Create categories to assign them to sets
workCategories.noOrgDefault: No default category set. Employees won't have work categories available.
workCategories.noSetsAvailable: No category sets available. Create one first.
workCategories.noSetsDescription: Create your first category set to define work types with time factors
workCategories.orgLevelDescription: Default category set applied to all employees unless overridden
workCategories.setDescriptionPlaceholder: Optional description for this category set
workCategories.teamLevelDescription: Override organization default for specific teams
workCategories.title: Work Categories

workerQueue.description: Monitor background job processing and cron job executions
workerQueue.recentExecutionsDescription: Last 50 job executions tracked in the database.
workerQueue.scheduledJobsDescription: Repeatable jobs configured in the worker. These run automatically on schedule.

workPolicies.assignTeamDescription: Override the organization default for a specific team.

workPolicies.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This will also remove all assignments for this policy. This action cannot be undone.

workPolicies.noPolicies: No work policies. Create a policy to define work schedules and time regulations.
workPolicies.noPresetsDescription: Labor law presets will be added here in a future update. Create custom policies for now.
workPolicies.noViolationsDescription: All employees are within compliance for the selected period.
workPolicies.orgLevelDescription: Default work policy applied to all employees unless overridden
workPolicies.policyDescription: Define work schedules and time regulations that can be assigned to your organization, teams, or employees.
workPolicies.policySelectDescription: Choose the work policy to assign
